description: After an easy and tasty dinner recipe? Try this lamb kofta that's served over a creamy yoghurt base alongside a zingy tomato salad and crispy chickpeas.
keywords: Kofta,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Lamb,Egg free,Sesame free,Sep 2021,Peanut free
name: Lamb Kofta & Yogurt Bowls With Tomato Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.25 cup Woolworths extra virgin olive oil
900g Woolworths BBQ Lamb Kebabs with Honey & Mint
3 cups Farmers Union Greek Style Yogurt

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200°C/180°C fanforced. Line a baking tray with baking paper. Combine chickpeas, paprika and 1 tsp oil in a bowl. Place on tray and season. Bake for 20 minutes or until golden.

Meanwhile, remove meat from skewers, then roll meat from each kebab into 2 balls. Heat 1 tbs oil in a large frying pan over medium heat. Cook kofta in 2 batches, turning, for 5 minutes or until cooked through. Transfer to a plate and cover to keep warm.

Combine lemon juice, tomato and remaining oil in a medium bowl. Season. Spread bowls with yogurt, then top with tomato mixture, cucumber, kofta, chickpeas and mint. Season with pepper. Serve with bread.
